name: Hodl Finance
public_notice: Hodl Finance will be transferring to a new token and HFT will no longer be supported. For detailed information, kindly visit this post.

description.en: The Hodl Finance ecosystem is designed to keep fueling innovative projects. Providing funding, community, and expertise, for a range of forward-thinking ideas. Becoming more sustainable, more profitable, and more innovative, with every transaction.
